channel.title: Identity on Argolon Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in Identity on Argolon Solutions

item.title: What's the story with sxore?
item.description: I installed the sxore comments management system on this site back on April 4th. I had a few issues getting it up and running but one of their developers was very helpful in getting it going. At the time I noted a few limitations and behaviours I wasn’t very happy with. Some are core features of the system which will not change and but others could change and I was reassured that they would.
